duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide guests with food, beverage, and towel service.
Assist with seating arrangements at the pool and surrounding areas.
Respond to all interactions in an efficient, courteous and professional manner to achieve maximum customer satisfaction.
Serving and clearing items, opening and closing side work, menu presentation, operating point of sale system as well as attending to guests poolside.
Retain knowledge of food and drink menu and confidently answer questions regarding it.
